message: Yeah, I figured this wasn't anything new, just thought I'd bring it up. I must admit it encourages engagement, however I think there is a proper balance to be struck.
hey @mttwrnr, hang in there ;) We know that this is an issue for people and are experimenting with ways to solve this problem. We should have some features out soon that will help ;)

I'm the type of person that hates lingering badges. If I see something is unread, I check on it. Unfortunately every topic in recent and my groups always has unreads next to it. It can be kind of overwhelming
We've just released some stuff that should help with this: http://blog.convore.com/post/4971903375/muting
